subtasks: FixViolationEditDealModalTests: Fix incomplete test entries for the edit deal modal opened from DealsListPage actions menu - add entries for saving edits, canceling, field validation, and side effects (timeline entries, follower notifications)
FixViolationDealDeletionSideEffects: Fix missing test entries for deal deletion side effects - add timeline entry on client and follower notification tests for Actions menu Delete
FixViolationWonBadgeDistinct: Fix Won status badge in DealsTable to be visually distinct from On Track - both currently use badge--success but test spec requires them to be distinct
FixViolationRelationshipDeleteTestEntries: Fix missing test entries for relationship delete button visibility/appearance and specify exact delete UI action in PersonDetailPage RelationshipsSection

FixViolationContactHistoryTeamMemberDropdown: Fix ContactHistorySection Team Member field to use SearchableSelect dropdown populated from users API instead of plain text input, in both add modal and edit form

FixViolationSidebarJSXComments: Add JSX comments next to every interactive element in SidebarNavigation.tsx and SidebarAuth.tsx with the titles of the tests that exercise each element (testSpec.md directive)
